Utils

Class Line

  • java.lang.Object
    • Utils.Line

  • public class Line
extends java.lang.Object
    Line is a common implementation of a 2D infinite line. Every lines verify this equation for every (x, y) : (a * x) + (b * y) + c = 0
    Since:
    2.0
     

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected double a
      Coefficient "a" in the equation : (a * x) + (b * y) + c = 0
      protected double b
      Coefficient "b" in the equation : (a * x) + (b * y) + c = 0
      protected double c
      Coefficient "c" in the equation : (a * x) + (b * y) + c = 0
      protected double precision
      Precision use for computes.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Line(double a, double b, double c)
      Construct a line with its coeficients' equation : a * x + b * y + c = 0
      Line(double a, double b, double c, double precision)
      Construct a line with its coeficients' equation : a * x + b * y + c = 0

      Line(Vector point1, Vector point2)
      Construct a line from two points
